landing.heroSubtitle: Instantly generate dozens of high-traffic, relevant keywords for platforms like Adobe Stock, Freepik, and Vecteezy.
landing.step1Description: Provide one or more titles for your images, vectors, or videos. Each title on a new line.
landing.step2Description: Our AI analyzes your titles and generates a targeted list of SEO-friendly keywords in seconds.
landing.step3Description: Easily copy keywords for a single title or all of them at once to use in your microstock metadata.
landing.feature1Description: Leverage the Gemini model to find relevant, high-traffic keywords that humans might miss.
landing.feature2Description: Save hours of work by generating keywords for multiple assets simultaneously.
landing.feature3Description: Keywords are tailored for top platforms, helping your content get discovered faster.

tour.step1Content: This quick tour will show you how to get the most out of our tool.
tour.step2Content: Generating keywords is as easy as 1-2-3. Follow these steps to success.
tour.step3Content: Discover why our AI-powered generator is the best choice for your microstock needs.
tour.step4Content: Click here to head over to the generator and create your first set of keywords!
